title: Video Game-Based Language Learning Design Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: An intensive short-term course where pre-service teachers experience language learning design incorporating game elements in mobile environments

learning_goals: Can apply the 4-stage game-based learning evaluation model (reaction-learning-behavior-results) to language instruction design contexts
Can develop game-based learning scenarios reflecting the three CRESST learning model elements (knowledge-skills-attitudes)
Enhances the ability to design language tasks utilizing game mechanics (quests, rewards, feedback) in mobile microlearning environments
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
